Message.Text: Hey Frank, I heard my students are using Snapchat to share code. Is that even possible?
Actually, Tommy, they’re using Discord for that.
Discord? But I thought they were all over Snapchat. How can they code on there?
They’re not on Snapchat; it’s Discord. They have channels for coding discussions.
I just don’t get it. Why would they use Snapchat for something like coding? That doesn’t make sense!
It’s really not Snapchat, Tommy. They’re utilizing Discord effectively.
So, if it’s Discord, then why do I keep hearing about Snapchat? I’m so confused!
Maybe there’s been a misunderstanding. Discord is the platform they’re using for their projects.
I guess that clears it up a bit, but I still can’t wrap my head around it. Why Snapchat then?
